alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 8:30PM CST until December 15 at 8:45PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR NORTHERN BUFFALO COUNTY... At 830 PM CST, a severe squall line capable of producing both tornadoes and extensive straight line wind damage was located near Modena, or 10 miles northeast of Wabasha, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. These dangerous storms will be near... Mondovi around 845 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Mondovi Airfield, Misha Mokwa, Maxville, The Big Swamp Area, Urne and County Roads F And K K. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
